00052 struct kmem_cache *osc_lock_kmem;
00053 struct kmem_cache *osc_object_kmem;
00054 struct kmem_cache *osc_thread_kmem;

00057 struct kmem_cache *osc_quota_kmem;

00059 struct lu_kmem_descr osc_caches[] = {
00060         {
00061                 .ckd_cache = &osc_lock_kmem,
00062                 .ckd_name  = "osc_lock_kmem",
00063                 .ckd_size  = sizeof (struct osc_lock)
00064         },
00065         {
00066                 .ckd_cache = &osc_object_kmem,
00067                 .ckd_name  = "osc_object_kmem",
00068                 .ckd_size  = sizeof (struct osc_object)
00069         },
00070         {
00071                 .ckd_cache = &osc_thread_kmem,
00072                 .ckd_name  = "osc_thread_kmem",
00073                 .ckd_size  = sizeof (struct osc_thread_info)
00074         },
00075         {
00076                 .ckd_cache = &osc_session_kmem,
00077                 .ckd_name  = "osc_session_kmem",

00079         },

00089         },
00090         {
00091                 .ckd_cache = NULL
00092         }

00101 static struct lu_device *osc2lu_dev(struct osc_device *osc)
00102 {
00103         return &osc->od_cl.cd_lu_dev;
00104 }
00105 
00106 /*****************************************************************************
00107  *
00108  * Osc device and device type functions.
00109  *
00110  */
00111 
00112 static void *osc_key_init(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00113                           struct lu_context_key *key)
00114 {
00115         struct osc_thread_info *info;
00116 
00117         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(info, osc_thread_kmem, GFP_NOFS);
00118         if (info == NULL)
00119                 info = ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
00120         return info;
00121 }
00122 
00123 static void osc_key_fini(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00124                          struct lu_context_key *key, void *data)
00125 {
00126         struct osc_thread_info *info = data;
00127 
00128         lu_buf_free(&info->oti_ladvise_buf);
00129         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(info, osc_thread_kmem);
00130 }
00131 
00132 struct lu_context_key osc_key = {
00133         .lct_tags = LCT_CL_THREAD,
00134         .lct_init = osc_key_init,
00135         .lct_fini = osc_key_fini
00136 };
00137 
00138 static void *osc_session_init(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00139                               struct lu_context_key *key)
00140 {
00141         struct osc_session *info;
00142 
00143         OBD_SLAB_ALLOC_PTR_GFP(info, osc_session_kmem, GFP_NOFS);
00144         if (info == NULL)
00145                 info = ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM);
00146         return info;
00147 }
00148 
00149 static void osc_session_fini(const struct lu_context *ctx,
00150                              struct lu_context_key *key, void *data)
00151 {
00152         struct osc_session *info = data;
00153         OBD_SLAB_FREE_PTR(info, osc_session_kmem);
00154 }
00155 
00156 struct lu_context_key osc_session_key = {
00157         .lct_tags = LCT_SESSION,
00158         .lct_init = osc_session_init,
00159         .lct_fini = osc_session_fini
00160 };
00161 
00162 /* type constructor/destructor: osc_type_{init,fini,start,stop}(). */
00163 LU_TYPE_INIT_FINI(osc, &osc_key, &osc_session_key);

00165 static int osc_cl_process_config(const struct lu_env *env,
00166                                  struct lu_device *d, struct lustre_cfg *cfg)
00167 {
00168         ENTRY;
00169         RETURN(osc_process_config_base(d->ld_obd, cfg));
00170 }
00171 
00172 static const struct lu_device_operations osc_lu_ops = {
00173         .ldo_object_alloc      = osc_object_alloc,
00174         .ldo_process_config    = osc_cl_process_config,
00175         .ldo_recovery_complete = NULL
00176 };
00177 
00178 static int osc_device_init(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_device *d,
00179                            const char *name, struct lu_device *next)
00180 {
00181         RETURN(0);
00182 }
00183 
00184 static struct lu_device *osc_device_fini(const struct lu_env *env,
00185                                          struct lu_device *d)
00186 {
00187         return NULL;
00188 }
00189 
00190 static struct lu_device *osc_device_free(const struct lu_env *env,
00191                                          struct lu_device *d)
00192 {
00193         struct osc_device *od = lu2osc_dev(d);
00194 
00195         cl_device_fini(lu2cl_dev(d));
00196         OBD_FREE_PTR(od);
00197         return NULL;
00198 }
00199 
00200 static struct lu_device *osc_device_alloc(const struct lu_env *env,
00201                                           struct lu_device_type *t,
00202                                           struct lustre_cfg *cfg)
00203 {
00204         struct lu_device *d;
00205         struct osc_device *od;
00206         struct obd_device *obd;
00207         int rc;
00208 
00209         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(od);
00210         if (od == NULL)
00211                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(-ENOMEM));
00212 
00213         cl_device_init(&od->od_cl, t);
00214         d = osc2lu_dev(od);
00215         d->ld_ops = &osc_lu_ops;
00216 
00217         /* Setup OSC OBD */
00218         obd = class_name2obd(lustre_cfg_string(cfg, 0));
00219         LASSERT(obd != NULL);
00220         rc = osc_setup(obd, cfg);
00221         if (rc) {
00222                 osc_device_free(env, d);
00223                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(rc));
00224         }
00225         od->od_exp = obd->obd_self_export;
00226         RETURN(d);
00227 }
00228 
00229 static const struct lu_device_type_operations osc_device_type_ops = {
00230         .ldto_init = osc_type_init,
00231         .ldto_fini = osc_type_fini,
00232 
00233         .ldto_start = osc_type_start,
00234         .ldto_stop  = osc_type_stop,
00235 
00236         .ldto_device_alloc = osc_device_alloc,
00237         .ldto_device_free  = osc_device_free,
00238 
00239         .ldto_device_init    = osc_device_init,
00240         .ldto_device_fini    = osc_device_fini
00241 };
00242 
00243 struct lu_device_type osc_device_type = {
00244         .ldt_tags     = LU_DEVICE_CL,
00245         .ldt_name     = LUSTRE_OSC_NAME,
00246         .ldt_ops      = &osc_device_type_ops,
00247         .ldt_ctx_tags = LCT_CL_THREAD
00248 };
